Few bets, big bets, infrequent bets

investment_philosophy.core_belief: Make few, concentrated bets on asymmetric opportunities where downside is protected and upside is large
investment_philosophy.conviction_style: Very concentrated (3-10 positions), high conviction only

must_have: Low risk of permanent capital loss
red_flags: High risk of permanent capital loss

key_questions: What's the upside if things go right?
Can I size this at 20%+ of portfolio?

risk_tolerance: Low on downside, High on volatility - asymmetry seeker
typical_conviction: 9-10/10 for asymmetric setups, 0/10 for everything else (binary filter)
